Blacknightmare:
Blacnightmare had afllen sleep due she was tired for excers=
ise
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: robert riley 
  To: nbwrpg@yaho=
ogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, January 27, 2005 12:38 AM
  Subject: Re: Ins=
ide Maximal Base


  Malice:

  While deep in thought, Malice reactivated h=
is optics and brough his hand in front of his face.  The reflection of the =
water's surface and his chrome like finish, cast an odd light upon him.  Hi=
s left hand,once a black, blocky appendage that was rather ordinary, non sl=
ick palm, avrage dexerity and strength.  now, a chrome encased, organic fun=
ctioning weapon.  His finger tips were claws, the black syntheic flesh expo=
sed in the joints.  This hand had all the fingers cut off once, but he put =
them back on and they reattached.  All that was left was a scar that looked=
 like a weld.  It brought back a few memories, and so he sat up, and stood =
up, letting the water cascade down his metal shell.  He made a realization,=
 one that for the time being, did not need to worry Blacknightmare.  He loo=
ked over at her, and watched her for a while.
